review: Bought one for myself and have come back for more as gifts for friends.  There is absolutely no reason not to have one of these (unless your TV/game system/Bluray player already does all the same stuff).Being able to let your friends throw up youtube vids into a community TV queue alone is worth the cost.Only major downside: no Amazon Prime Video and there probably never will be.  Amazon is pimping their own streaming stick alternative.
